meanings.definition: A closed plane figure with three straight sides and three angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew three triangles in my art class today.
meanings.sent2: The flag had red, white, and blue triangles on it.
meanings.sent3: The pizza slices were cut into tiny triangles, making them look like mini mountains.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp words formed emotional triangles between us.
meanings.sent5: The triangles on the road sign warned of a sharp turn ahead.

meanings.definition: Something that is triangular in shape.
meanings.sent1: The roof of the house had several triangles on it.
meanings.sent2: She found a beautiful necklace with small silver triangles.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with colorful triangles made of frosting.
meanings.sent4: The trees cast long triangles of shade on the grass.
meanings.sent5: The kite soared high in the sky, its tail trailing behind in triangles.

meanings.definition: A situation involving three people or things.
meanings.sent1: The project required us to work together in triangles.
meanings.sent2: They formed a strong bond, creating a supportive triangle.
meanings.sent3: The love triangle in the movie kept the audience guessing until the end.
meanings.sent4: The three friends formed an unbreakable triangle of friendship.
meanings.sent5: The competition was fierce as each team tried to outsmart the other in a game of triangles.
